title: Language Classification Schema
description: A schema for classifying the computational complexity of repository components.

name.description: The name of the component being classified.

classification.description: The component's classification in the Chomsky hierarchy.

justification.description: A detailed justification for the classification, potentially referencing formal methods like the pumping lemma.

strategy.description: The strategy used to decompose the component.

components.description: The sub-components resulting from the decomposition.
